scenario.name: REGISTER
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: reg-[call_number]@[local_ip] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
